title: Riot Reward Glitch
body:
So I got a reward from Riot when I logged in today, and it was the Crimson Elite Talon skin. I would've been happy but I already had the skin. So do I just get like nothing? I am confused.

Edit: If I could get SSW Talon instead I would be ecstatic :)

Edit 2: Just noticed the warning in the client. I guess I didn't actually get a gift. Sadness.

replies.body: Sorry for the confusion!  Indeed, it's a toast notification of old stuff you already received.  The toast notifications were enabled on the updated client so it's showing old stuff.  Let me know if that clears things up!
